channel.title: Blogging on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Moving to Netlify!
item.description: Just moved this site from Amazon S3/Cloudfront to Netlify! Also moved DNS hosting from Route 53 to Cloudflare DNS (while disabling Cloudflare CDN and instead using Netlify’s CDN).

item.title: About Hugo
item.description: Make the Web Fun Again Introducing Hugo, a new idea around making website creation simple again. Hugo flexibly works with many formats and is ideal for blogs, docs, portfolios and much more. Hugoâ€™s speed fosters creativity and makes building a website fun again.
